headline: When He  Was Good,  He Was Stunning
abstract: The mesmerizing, frustrating world of Félix Vallotton, now at the Metropolitan Museum.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss painter and printmaker Félix Vallotton was an intriguing, talented but slippery artist. From painting to painting in “Félix Vallotton: Painter of Disquiet,” a small survey of his career, at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, you often don’t quite know what to expect next in terms of style or subject, even within the same year.
